description: '''Michael Emanuel''' (born March 21, 1975), better known by his stage name '''Michale Graves''', is an American singer. He is best known as the lead vocalist for the 1990s re-incarnation of the [[horror punk]] band [[Misfits (band)|Misfits]] from 1995 to 2000, leaving briefly in 1998. He has also released several albums as a solo artist.
